name: Meydan Racecourse - Wikipedia
snippet: Meydan Racecourse is a racecourse in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. The grandstand is a half mile in length, and can accommodate over 60,000 spectators. Missing: distance configuration

name: Going & Track Conditions at Meydan Racecourse
snippet: Meydan stages racing on two surfaces: turf and dirt. Each has its own going descriptions. Turf Going. Firm – A fast surface with minimal give.
